args.natural_language_statement:
Let U be an open subset of ‚ÑÇ, f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ be holomorphic on U, and p ‚àà U with deriv f p ‚â† 0. Then there exist open sets V and W in ‚ÑÇ with p ‚àà V ‚äÜ U, f '' V = W, and f|V is a bijection onto W with a holomorphic inverse. Formally: ‚àÄ (U : Set ‚ÑÇ) (f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ) (p : ‚ÑÇ), IsOpen U ‚Üí IsHolomorphicOn f U ‚Üí p ‚àà U ‚Üí deriv f p ‚â† 0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ (V W : Set ‚ÑÇ), IsOpen V ‚àß IsOpen W ‚àß p ‚àà V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß f '' V = W ‚àß Function.BijOn f V W ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (invFun (f|V)) W.

End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex Set Function

/-- Local holomorphic inverse theorem for complex holomorphic functions. -/
theorem local_holomorphic_inverse (U : Set ‚ÑÇ) (f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ) (p : ‚ÑÇ)
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : IsHolomorphicOn f U) (hp : p ‚àà U) (hfp : deriv f p ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ (V W : Set ‚ÑÇ), IsOpen V ‚àß IsOpen W ‚àß p ‚àà V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß f '' V = W ‚àß
    BijOn f V W ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (invFun (f ‚àò Subtype.val ?)) W := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

theorem local_holomorphic_inverse (U : Set Complex) (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex) (p : Complex)
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : DifferentiableOn Complex f U) (hp : p ‚àà U) (hfp : deriv f p ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ (V W : Set Complex) (g : Complex ‚Üí Complex),
    IsOpen V ‚àß IsOpen W ‚àß p ‚àà V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß f '' V = W ‚àß
    (‚àÄ x1 x2, x1 ‚àà V ‚Üí x2 ‚àà V ‚Üí f x1 = f x2 ‚Üí x1 = x2) ‚àß
    (‚àÄ y, y ‚àà W ‚Üí f (g y) = y) ‚àß (‚àÄ x, x ‚àà V ‚Üí g (f x) = x) ‚àß
    DifferentiableOn Complex g W := by sorry
